ReleaseNotes.string:
The first release in almost a year and full of new features and bug fixes. A recommended upgrade for all users!

  • .NET dependency moved to .NET 4
  • Expert Mode for custom commands
  • Documentation finally added to the wiki on GitHub

This will be the last major release to support Windows XP. Future major versions will target more modern OSes. As Microsoft's support for Windows XP has already ended, this is reasonable.
